des: "Fast, easy, creamy Caesar salad dressing that is also an excellent marinade for chicken or fresh seafood.  Best when allowed to sit refrigerated for a day or two."
ins: In a food processor or blender, combine the olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, anchovy paste, mustard, garlic, sour cream and Parmesan cheese. Process until smooth. Pour into a glass container, seal, and refrigerate until ready to use.
